CustomField.description: Sum of Net ACV less Adjusted RACV and Adjustment to NACV
CustomField.formula: IF( Adjusted_RACV__c > Net_ACV__c, 0, Net_ACV__c - Adjusted_RACV__c + Adjustment_to_NACV__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sum of Net ACV less Adjusted RACV and Adjustment to NACV
CustomField.label: Net NACV
